traits.appearance: wears distinctive jewelry: earrings, necklace, circlet, bracelets
traits.abilities: is persuasive, forceful, and a born leader, but is feeble and scrawny

personality.mannerism: Nervously flips a coin through fingers

voice.vocals: Speaks Quickly, at a Normal pitch.
